mata hithenawa mehema deyak.ganika wruththiya nithigatha kirima pilibadawa.hithanawa eya wadagath yayi kiyala.mata therenawa buddhagame ape thunwana silpadaya kadimak.eeth nithigatha kalapamanin eya kadenne naha.pirimi mudal gewa owun miladi gatha yuthuyi.surameraya ganath silpadayak thibenawa.eeth nithigatha surasal rata pura thibenawa.hamoma bonne nane.therenawa neda?thunwana silpadaya pilibada karanawatha eyama wenawa nam pahasuyi.watinakam thibiya yuththe thaman sathuwayi.thahanam karala nawathwanna podi lamayi nemeyi.

hambanthota waraya ha maththala guwan thotupala idikirimata pa්rathama sakas kala parisara balapam agayim warthawala pahadiliwa sandahan kara aththe me sanwardhana katayuthu samaga awathanwana ali – athunta rakawaranaya salasima sandaha hambanthota wana ali kalamanakarana rakshithaya pa්rakashayata path kala yuthu bawa ya.
